title: ISic000115. I.Sicily inscription 000115
body:
Facsimile Images

Dis ((·)) Manibus ((·)) sac(rum)
Callis⸢t⸣o ((·)) ⸢t⸣raeci ((·)) Treb(oni?) ((·))
fecit ((·)) Spec<i?> ((·)) eques
cons(ervo) ((·)) bene merenti
5v(ixit?) ((·)) XX

Apparatus criticus

Text based on ILTermini; Gualtherus: CALLISIO·IRAECI

English translation

Sacred to the Shades of the Underworld; to Callistus, a thraex (of Trebonius?). Spec(i?)es, an eques, made (this) to his well-deserving fellow-slave, who lived 20 years (?).

commentary
